articles.title: Are Irish tourist's holidays to Europe in danger this winter? Covid latest for Spain, Germany, Italy and more - Irish Mirror
articles.description: 'It's a warning shot for the world to see what is happening in Europe despite availability of vaccination'
articles.content:
Much of Europe is now seeing a resurgence in Covid in line with what Ireland experienced in the last few weeks.
